class.reporter:label: Metabib Field to Indexing Normalizer Map
Circulation Matrix Circulation Modifier Subtest Circulation Modifier Set
Electronic Access URI to Call Number Map
Biblio Record Entry Bucket Item Note
Bib IDs by Holding Add/Delete Time (OCLC batch update)

class.oils_persist:source_definition: SELECT u.hold, c.circ_lib, count(*) FROM action.unfulfilled_hold_list u JOIN asset.copy c ON (c.id = u.current_copy) GROUP BY 1,2
SELECT hold, min(count) FROM action.unfulfilled_hold_loops GROUP BY 1
SELECT DISTINCT l.* FROM action.unfulfilled_hold_loops l JOIN action.unfulfilled_hold_min_loop m USING (hold) WHERE l.count = m.min
SELECT hold, max(count) FROM action.unfulfilled_hold_loops GROUP BY 1
SELECT DISTINCT l.* FROM action.unfulfilled_hold_loops l JOIN action.unfulfilled_hold_max_loop m USING (hold) WHERE l.count = m.max

class.reporter:label: Inter-system Copy Transit
class.oils_persist:source_definition: SELECT t.* FROM action.transit_copy t JOIN actor.org_unit AS s ON (t.source = s.id) JOIN actor.org_unit AS d ON (t.dest = d.id) WHERE s.parent_ou <> d.parent_ou

SELECT copy, SUM(count) AS count, year, is_renewal FROM ( SELECT cp.id as copy, COUNT(circ.id), EXTRACT(YEAR FROM circ.xact_start) AS year, (phone_renewal OR desk_renewal OR opac_renewal) as is_renewal FROM asset.copy cp JOIN action.circulation circ ON (cp.id = circ.target_copy) GROUP BY 1, 3, 4 UNION SELECT cp.id as copy, COUNT(circ.id), EXTRACT(YEAR FROM circ.xact_start) AS year, (phone_renewal OR desk_renewal OR opac_renewal) as is_renewal FROM asset.copy cp JOIN action.aged_circulation circ ON (cp.id = circ.target_copy) GROUP BY 1, 3, 4 UNION SELECT id as copy, circ_count, -1 AS year, false as is_renewal FROM extend_reporter.legacy_circ_count )x GROUP BY 1, 3, 4
